ref: Ili kumchangamsha wazazi wa Kip walimpeleka Florida.

src: He gives up because it's too hard.
mt: Anapokata tamaa kwa sababu ni vigumu.

src: They praised him.
mt: Wanawake waliwatafuta.
ref: Wakamsifu.

src: I put the box back and found another place to dig.
mt: Nilimwacha kifaa chako na kujifungua kwa mahali mwingine.
ref: Nikarudisha sanduku hilo na nikapata mahali pengine pa kuchimba.

mt: Alienda nyumbani kwa Sam, na wao wakapata kujitikisa!
ref: Alisafiri nyumbani kwenda kumwoona Sam, na wote walikuwa wamekosa kuonana sana!

src: Joey hated camping.
mt: Joey alikuwa na hasira kwa kufanya kambi.
ref: Joey alichukia kupiga kambi.

src: She ate a huge lunch.
mt: Aliwachemsha chakula kikubwa.
ref: Akala chakula kikubwa cha mchana.

mt: Wote walikuwa wakipendelea kwamba Jason alikuwa anasoma lugha mbili.
ref: Kila mtu alivutiwa kwamba Jason alikuwa anaweza kuongea lugha mbili.

src: She was mad because Todd wouldn't stop talking.
mt: Aliwa na furaha kwa sababu Todd hakuacha kusema.
ref: Alikuwa amekasirika kwa sababu Todd hakuacha kuongea.

src: We hate parties.
mt: Hatutaki vyama.
ref: Tunachukia sherehe.

src: They handed them around to all the neighbors.
mt: Walipanga kwa wale wote wanao wakapata.
ref: Wakawapea majirani wao wote.

src: She ended up being very poor.
mt: Alipokwenda kwa sababu alikuwa na upeo mdogo.
ref: Kumbe alikuwa masikini sana.

src: School stayed open longer than usual.
mt: Shule ilikuwa imefika zaidi kuliko kawaida.
ref: Shule zilisalia zimefunguliwa kwa muda mrefu zaidi ya kawaida.

src: Larry was mad about his score.
mt: Larry alikuwa na hasira kuhusu kile kilichopatikana.
ref: Larry alikasirika kuhusu alama yake.

src: She didn't want to binge eat out of depression.
mt: Alimwambia hawakutaka kula kwa kipindi kwa sababu ya ugonjwa.
ref: Hakutaka kula sana kwa sababu ya huzuni.

src: I decided to go for a run.
mt: Nilichagua kufanya runi.
ref: Nikaamua kwenda kukimbia.

src: She spent the money on going out to eat.
mt: Aliwatumia pesa hiyo kwa kufika kwenye chakula cha nje.
ref: Alitumia pesa hizo kwenda kula.

src: Ora took a bath.
mt: Ora alipata maji.
ref: Ora akaoga.

src: Allison plans to pay bingo again in the future.
mt: Allison anatarajia kutoa bingi tena katika mazingira ya siku za kujitolea.
ref: Allison anapanga kucheza bingo tena baadaye.

src: Nya missed the parade altogether.
mt: Nya alipata kufa kwa kujificha.
ref: Nya alikosa gwaride hilo.

src: Madeline was upset with her new purchase.
mt: Madeline alikuwa na hasira na soko lake mpya.
ref: Madeline alikasirika kwa ununuzi wake mpya.

src: So Tom moved the plant to a window.
mt: Kwa hiyo Tom alimvuta mti kwenye jikoni.
ref: kwa hivyo Tom akahamisha mmea huo kwenye dirisha.

src: Ranger fans want him to go away.
mt: Wafuasi wa Rangers wanataka kwenda.
ref: Mashabiki wa Ranger wanataka aende.

src: Avery dropped out of school.
mt: Avery alisimama kutoka shule.
ref: Avery aliacha shule.

src: Chester immediately threw out the shirt he bought.
mt: Chester alitumbua kanzu aliyopewa.
ref: Mara moja Chester akatupa shati hilo alilonunua.

src: Gina wished she hadn't wasted her day.
mt: Gina alimwamini kama hakuwahi kutumia siku yake.
ref: Gina alitamani hangekuwa amepoteza siku yake.

src: All my clothes smell great.
mt: Zote vyombo vyangu vinaangalia vizuri.
ref: Nguo zangu zote zinanukia vizuri.

src: He was happy.
mt: Alikuwa na furaha.
ref: Alifurahi.

src: They were so relieved.
mt: Walikuwa na hofu kubwa.
ref: Walifarijika sana.

src: They walked around campus and got invited to a party.
mt: Wakawa na wakarudi kwa kufika katika shamba la chuo na kupewa kipindi cha kufanya mazungumzo.
ref: Wakatembea kwenye kampasi na wakaalikwa kwa sherehe.

src: She listened to a book while she ran.
mt: Aliyemkuta kitabu wakati wa kufanya runing.
ref: Akasikiliza kitabu alipokuwa akikimbia.

src: She lasted the whole night.
mt: Aliwakalia kwa jioni nzima.
ref: Alidumu hapo usiku mbili.

src: Sam had no car.
mt: Sam hakuna gari.
ref: Sam hakuwa na gari.

src: They slept soundly after that.
mt: Wakakula kwa salama baada ya hayo.
ref: Walilala vizuri baada ya hiyo.

src: Winter is the season that sees the most skiers.
mt: Bara ni wakati ambao unakuta wengi zaidi wa skiers.
ref: Majira ya baridi ndio msimu ambao una mawingu mengi.

src: He was happy to be in Iran.
mt: Alifurahia kuwa nchini Iran.
ref: Alifurahi kuwa Irani.

src: The girl said yes to Andrew.
mt: Jamaa alisema naye Andrew.
ref: Msichana huyo akamkubali Andrew.

src: Amy then left the airplane and drove home.
mt: Amy kisha kutoka ndege yake alikuwa anavyotembea nyumbani.
ref: Kisha Amy akaondoka kwenye uwanja wa ndege na kwenda nyumbani.

src: Ana was extremely pale.
mt: Ana alikuwa na rangi ya mawe.
ref: Ngozi ya Ana ilikuwa hafifu sana.

src: Paul was very frustrated.
mt: Paul alikuwa na hasira kubwa.
ref: Paul alifadhaishwa sana.

src: The mouse got away.
mt: Kuswala alipata nafasi.
ref: Panya akatoroka.

src: Neil found the trip stimulating.
mt: Neil alitambua safari hiyo kama ya kujifunza.
ref: Neil alipata kwamba safari hiyo ilimsisimua.

src: Mary was very happy.
mt: Mary alikuwa na furaha kubwa.
ref: Mary alifurahi sana.

src: Gina and her sister had a great time together.
mt: Gina na ndugu yake waliendelea kwa namna nzuri pamoja.
ref: Gina na dada yake walikuwa na wakati mzuri pamoja.

src: I went to swim and enjoy the sunshine.
mt: Nilikuwa nimeenda kwa kupiga kwa maji na kuendelea na mawingu.
ref: Nilienda kuogelea na kufurahia jua.

src: Arnold loved his girlfriend's cats.
mt: Arnold alivijua wanyama wawili wa pili wa binti yake.
ref: Arnold alipenda paka wa mpenziwe.

src: Leah gets fired.
mt: Leah anapewa kazi.
ref: Leah akafutwa kazi.

src: I bought every mouse they had.
mt: Nilimwaga kila mchwa waliokuwa na.
ref: Nilinunua kila kipanya nilichokipata.

src: Bob felt very energized.
mt: Bob alikuwa na nguvu kubwa sana.
ref: Bob alihisi amesisimka sana.

src: I cheered when the Beatle came under the spotlight.
mt: Nilimshukuru wakati Beatle alipata ujumbe.
ref: Nilishangilia wakati Beatle walipoangaziwa.

src: Maggie's cat was dead.
mt: Kaka wa Maggie alikuwa amekufa.
ref: Paka wa Maggie alikuwa amekufa.

src: Joe liked how the blinds let in the warmth and light.
mt: Joe alivuti kwa njia ya kuzingatia mawimbi ya mawingu kwa ajili ya kuzingatia mawimbi ya mawingu.
ref: Joe alipenda jinsi pazia hizo ziliruhusu joto na mwangaza.

src: Joey knew everybody was just teasing him.
mt: Joey alijua wote walikuwa wakifanya njozi naye.
ref: Joey alijua kila mtu alikuwa akimtania.

src: They waited until the incident was over.
mt: Waliamini mpaka kile kilivyokwisha.
ref: Walisubiri hadi tukio hilo likaisha.

src: He made sure to buy rechargeable batteries this time.
mt: Alifanya kila alichokifanya kwa sasa.
ref: Wakati huu akahakikisha amenunua betri zinazoweza kuchajiwa upya.

src: Now I can bike 30 miles.
mt: Sasa nimejifunza kwa kubikea 30 mila.
ref: Sasa ninaweza kuendesha baisikeli kwa maili 30.

src: That was the best trip of my life.
mt: Kwamba ni safari bora zangu za maisha.
ref: Hiyo likuwa safari nzuri kabisa kwa maisha yangu.

src: I was worried about my grade.
mt: Nilikuwa nimeangalia daraja.
ref: Nilikuwa na wasiwasi wa gregi yangu.

src: Sally hopes to lose her job.
mt: Sally anataka kupoteza kazi yake.
ref: Sally anatarajia kupoteza kazi yake.

src: We found we made a mess in the kitchen.
mt: Tulipata kuwa tulikuwa tunafanya kazi kwa uhalisia katika chumba cha kuchoma.
ref: Tuligundua tumechafua jikoni.

src: Will started to listen to his teacher.
mt: Will alianza kusikiliza mwalimu wake.
ref: Will alianza kumsikiliza mwalimu wake.

src: Emily was reprimanded by her parents.
mt: Emily alipigwa na wazazi wake.
ref: Emily alikemewa na wazazi wake.

src: We enthusiastically played the game till it got dark.
mt: Kwa furaha sana tulitumia mchezo hadi kufika jioni.
ref: Tulicheza mchezo huo kwa shauku hadi giza likaingia.

src: I was successful.
mt: Nilikuwa mafanikio.
ref: Nilifanikiwa.

src: She was the first person to arrive.
mt: Alikuwa mwanamke wa kwanza kufika.
ref: Alikuwa mtu wa kwanza kuwasili.

src: I thought Jack was very polite.
mt: Nilimwamini Jack alikuwa mwenye ujasiri.
ref: Nilidhani Jack alikuwa mpole sana.

src: Gabe decided to purchase a desk for his room.
mt: Gabe aliamua kupata meza kwa ndege kwa chumba chake.
ref: Gabe aliamua kununua dawati la chumba chake.

src: Rick refuses to even think about going camping now.
mt: Rick hanaacha kuelewa kuhusu kujenga sasa.
ref: Rick hukataa hata kufikiria kwenda kupiga kambi sasa.

src: Jerry decided later it was easier to collect unemployment.
mt: Jerry aliamua baadaye kwamba ni rahisi zaidi kupata ushuru wa kazi.
ref: Jerry aliamua baadaye ilikuwa rahisi kukusanya ukosefu wa ajira.

src: Emile eventually got a job as a chef.
mt: Emile alipata kazi kama mchekeshaji.
ref: Emile mwishowe alipata kazi kama mpishi.

src: Ella was happy that the picnic wasn't ruined.
mt: Ella alikuwa na furaha kwamba pika yake haikufa.
ref: Ella alikuwa na furaha kwamba picnic haikuharibika.

src: She caught hypothermia.
mt: Aliipata ukatazamaji.
ref: Alipata joto la mwili.

src: She let the technician change her oil.
mt: Aliwahubiria wakala kuchangia mafuta yake.
ref: Alimwacha mtunzaji abadilishe mafuta yake.

src: Harry wished he wouldn't have went.
mt: Harry alimwamini kama hakuwa na kuingia.
ref: Harry alitamani asingeenda.

src: He no longer had any interest in wrestling.
mt: Alisahau kabisa kushindana.
ref: Hakuwa na hamu tena ya kupigana mwereka.

src: Joan felt bad about the dinner but glad she was assertive.
mt: Joan alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu chakula cha jioni, lakini alikuwa na furaha kwamba alikuwa na uwezo.
ref: Joan alihisi vibaya kuhusu chakula hicho cha jioni lakini alifurahi alijitetea.

src: Jesse's parents were upset with her.
mt: Wazazi wa Jesse walikuwa na wasiwasi na yeye.
ref: Wazazi wa Jesse walikasirika na yeye.

src: Juliette built a volcano.
mt: Juliette alibuni volikano.
ref: Juliette alijenga volkano.

src: Rob finally left to hang out with his friends.
mt: Rob akafaulu kufika na wenzake.
ref: Mwishowe Rob aliondoka kwenda kubarizi na marafiki zake.

src: All of the eggs landed safely.
mt: Jumuiya ya mababu yote yalipata nafasi.
ref: Mayai yote yalitua salama.

src: Everyone hated the slave trader's song.
mt: Wote walikuwa wakijivunia nyimbo ya wakulima wafanyabiashara.
ref: Kila mtu alichukia wimbo huo wa mfanyabiashara wa watumwa.

src: Ella had to be taken to the doctor.
mt: Ella alipaswa kutembea kwa daktari.
ref: Ella alilazimika kupelekwa hospitalini.

src: Her doctor said she was healthier, too.
mt: Wakati wa kuzunguka, daktari alisema alikuwa afya zaidi.
ref: Daktari wake alisema alikuwa na afya njema pia.

src: Bobby passed the football for hours after the game.
mt: Bobby alitupa mpira kwa saa baada ya mchezo.
ref: Bobby alicheza mpira kwa saa kadhaa baada ya mchezo.

src: Susan was upset with the whole ordeal.
mt: Susan alikuwa na wasiwasi kwa kila kitu.
ref: Susan alikasirika na tukio lote.

src: The cactus flourished under his care.
mt: Kumbi kilivumilia kwa kipindi chake.
ref: Dungusi kakati ilistawi chini ya uangalizi wake.

src: Gina went straight to bed.
mt: Gina alipofika nyumbani alipofika kwenye kinga.
ref: Gina alienda kitandani moja kwa moja.

src: Avery's parents were proud.
mt: Wazazi wa Avery walikuwa na furaha.
ref: Wazazi wa Avery walijivunia.

src: The orchids would be ugly.
mt: Orkidizi watakuwa wabaya.
ref: Okidi yangeonekana mbaya sana.

src: And asked her to marry him.
mt: Na akamwuliza kwa upole.
ref: Na akamuuliza kama atakubali kumuoa.

src: Tommy had good friends.
mt: Tommy alikuwa na wenzake wabaya.
ref: Tommy alikuwa na marafiki wazuri.

src: We went to a dentist who pulled the tooth.
mt: Tulipokwenda kwa daktari wa mifupa aliyepiga mifuko.
ref: Tulikwenda kwa daktari wa meno aliyevuta jino hilo.

src: Amelia decided to never go back to Mexico.
mt: Amelia aliamua kudumu kwa sasa.
ref: Akaamua hatawahi kurudi Mexico.

src: We told the kids that Santa must have share with the reindeer.
mt: Tulimwambia watoto kwamba Santa alikuwa amecheza na nyani.
ref: Tuliwaambia watoto kwamba haikuso kuwa Santa alishiriki na kulungu wa nchi za baridi.

src: She was so grateful and promised to pay her coworker back.
mt: Aliwakaribisha sana na kupanga kujitolea kwa mwenzake.
ref: Alishukuru sana na akaahidi atamlipa mfanyakazi mwenzake.

src: The government continued to fund computer labs.
mt: Serikali ilikuwa ikifundisha makabati ya kompyuta.
ref: Serikali iliendelea kufadhili maabara za kompyuta.

src: I decided to forfeit the game.
mt: Nilichagua kubadili mchezo.
ref: Nikaamua kupoteza mchezo.

src: The kid practiced all year and next year he made the team.
mt: Kijana alifanya mazoezi kwa mwaka na mwaka ujao alifika kikundi.
ref: Mtoto alifanya mazoezi mwaka mzima na mwaka uliofuata alikuwa kwenye timu.

src: The baby even pet the dog right afterwards.
mt: Kama ilivyotambulika, pili pia alimwamini mbwa baada ya hapo.
ref: Mtoto hata alimpapasa mbwa mara tu baadaye.

src: I really liked my new hair cut.
mt: Nilipenda sana kuchukua kifua changu.
ref: Nilipenda sana nilivyonyolewa nywele.

src: I cleaned my motorcycle after I got home.
mt: Nilimwagia moto moto baada ya kuja nyumbani.
ref: Nilisafisha pikipiki yangu baada ya kufika nyumbani.

src: Ryan got fired.
mt: Ryan alipigwa kibali.
ref: Ryan alifutwa kazi.

src: The man stopped at the rest stop and got out of the car.
mt: Kiumbe huo alisimama katika barabara ya kujitolea na kuchukua nje gari lake.
ref: Mwanaume huyo alisimama kwenye kituo cha kupumzika na akashuka kwenye gari.

src: Josiah crawled to his mother and took the toy.
mt: Josiah alikwenda kwa mama yake na kuchukua duka.
ref: Josiah alitambaa akafikia mama yake na akachukua kifaa cha kucheza.

src: I brought a dog home since I have so many dogs already.
mt: Nilimwambia kuuza mbwa kwa nyumbani kwa sababu nimekuwa na wengi wengi kwa sasa.
ref: Nilileta mbwa nyumbani kwani nina mbwa wengi tayari.

src: All his classmates were very supportive though.
mt: Wote wao wakifundishaji walikuwa wakifurahia kwa kiasi hicho.
ref: Ingawa wanafunzi wenzake wote walikuwa wanamuunga mkono sana.

src: Matt and Lexi had a great time at prom.
mt: Matt na Lexi walikuwa na muda mzuri katika prom.
ref: Matt na Lexi walikuwa na wakati mzuri katika dansi ya uhitimu.

src: She was heartbroken.
mt: Alimwaga moyo.
ref: Alivunjika moyo.

src: John had carrots instead.
mt: John alikuwa na kungu badala ya kungu.
ref: John alikula na karoti badala yake.

src: He awaited a call back, but he never heard from the judges again.
mt: Alitaka kujibu, lakini hakupata habari kutoka kwa wajumbe tena.
ref: Alisubiri kupigiwa simu, lakini majaji hawakuwasiliana na yeye tena.

src: Then we collapsed on the couch and slept past noon.
mt: Baadaye tulipiga kwa sofa na kulala zaidi ya saa moja.
ref: Kisha tukaanguka kwenye kochi na tukalala saa hadi sita mchana.

src: Ally used the three hundred dollars to buy clothes.
mt: Ally alitumia elfu tatu kwa kupata vyeti vya kufanya biashara.
ref: Ally alitumia dola mia tatu kununua nguo.

src: I realized that my bicycle had only been suitable for one rider.
mt: Nilijua kwamba biki yangu yalikuwa tayari tu kwa mmoja.
ref: Niligundua kuwa baiskeli yangu ilikuwa inafaa msafiri mmoja tu.

src: They decided to turn around.
mt: Wakati huo wakapanga kufanya kama hivyo.
ref: Waliamua kugeuka.

src: Ana decided never to wait that long again.
mt: Ana aliamua hivi sasa hivi kwa siku zote.
ref: Ana aliamua hatasubiri kwa muda mrefu tena.

src: The worker thanked Mark for his patronage.
mt: Kazi yake alimshukuru Mark kwa uwezaji wake.
ref: Mfanyakazi huyo alimshukuru Mark kwa uteja wake.

src: I can't wait to to start the paint-by-numbers set!
mt: Ninamchukua kwa muda mrefu kuanza kipande cha rangi!
ref: Siwezi kusubiri kuanza seti ya paka rangi kulingana na nambari!

src: Rex loves cleaning the bathroom.
mt: Rex anapenda kuchimba nyumba.
ref: Rex anapenda kusafisha bafu.

src: I aced my exam.
mt: Nilipata mafanikio katika kipindi changu cha kuchapisha.
ref: Nilipita mtihani wangu.

src: Munich looked good in the picture's background.
mt: Munich ilikuwa nzuri katika picha ya nyuma.
ref: Munich ilionekana vizuri nyuma ya picha hiyo.

src: I washed the blue shirt.
mt: Nilimwagia kanzu ya kijivu.
ref: Nilifua shati la bluu.

src: He fell asleep.
mt: Alipata nishati.
ref: Alilala.

src: One hunter yawned and walked away.
mt: Moja kati ya wanyama wakakaa na kufurika na kufika.
ref: Mwindaji mmoja alipiga miayo na akaenda zake.

src: Todd is proud of himself.
mt: Todd anajifurahia kwa kujitajirisha.
ref: Todd anajivunia.

src: Maggie was happy to have a new companion.
mt: Maggie alikuwa na furaha kwa kuwa na mpenzi mpya.
ref: Maggie alifurahi kupata rafiki mpya.

src: I did not have anyone to talk to though.
mt: Nilikuwa bila mtu kwa kufanya mazungumzo.
ref: Ingawa sikuwa na mtu wa kuzungumza naye.

src: Eventually, she hated all men.
mt: Kwa hatia, alihofia wote.
ref: Mwishowe, alichukia wanaume wote.

src: Bobby was bored.
mt: Bobby alikuwa na shida.
ref: Bobby alikuwa ameboeka.

src: I hope to never hear that song again.
mt: Nilinipenda kujua tena nyimbo hiyo.
ref: Natumai sitasikia wimbo huo tena.

src: Al and Val went out to eat.
mt: Al na Val wakati wa chakula.
ref: Al na Val walikwenda kula.

src: I wish I had gotten more tickets.
mt: Ninasema nikiwa na zaidi tiketi.
ref: Natamani ningepata tiketi zaidi.

src: David learns to play piano.
mt: David anajifunza kucheza piano.
ref: David anajifunza kucheza piano.

src: But it was worth it when she saw her straightened teeth.

mt: Joe alikuwa amezaa Grant fedha.
ref: Joe akamkopesha Grant pesa.

src: After a long time, he learned to code properly.
mt: Baada muda mrefu, alielewa kwa njia sahihi.
ref: Baada ya muda mrefu, alijifunza vizuri mwandiko wa fumbo.

src: Lobster was Rakesh's least favorite food.
mt: Kabukabu ilikuwa chakula cha Rakesh cha chini.
ref: Kambamiti ndio ilikuwa chakula ambacho Rakesh hakipendi kabisa.

src: My dad then took me to get my license.
mt: Baba yangu kisha alimwambia nimechukua lisensia yangu.
ref: Kisha baba yangu alinipeleka kuchukua leseni yangu.

src: Ron was very happy.
mt: Ron alikuwa na furaha kubwa.
ref: Ron alifurahi sana.

src: He didn't listen until we got a lot of ants one spring.
mt: Alisikia mpaka tulipata wanyama wengi mnamo mwezi wa kuchipua.
ref: Hakusikiliza hadi tulipopata siafu wengi majira fulani ya kuchipua.

src: Brad had delicious Eggs Benedict.
mt: Brad alikuwa na mchuzi wa mabungo ya maziwa.
ref: Brad alikula mayai matamu ya Benedict.

src: Paulo was ashamed of what he did.
mt: Paulo alikuwa na hofu kuhusu yale aliyofanya.
ref: Paulo aliabika kwa alichokifanya.

src: Patrick developed a fear of dogs because of the incident.
mt: Patrick alijenga kwa kujivunia mbwa kutokana na kesi hiyo.
ref: Patrick akawa na hofu ya mbwa kwa sababu ya tukio hilo.

src: I was so angry at myself!
mt: Nilikuwa na furaha kubwa na wewe!
ref: Nilijikasirikia sana!

src: I am much healthier now.
mt: Nilikuwa na afya nzuri zaidi sasa.
ref: Sasa nina afya nzuri zaidi.

src: Kelly jumped for joy.
mt: Kelly alitupilia chini.
ref: Kelly aliruka kwa furaha.

src: Jane's girlfriend was a die-hard flower lover.
mt: Jane's mke ni mwenye upendo mkubwa kwa vyuo.
ref: Mpenzi wa Jane alikuwa mpenzi wa thati wa maua.

src: Michael was disappointed in himself.
mt: Michael alikuwa na hasira naye.
ref: Michael alivunjika moyo sana.

src: Damon went straight to his room and went to bed.
mt: Damon alipofika nyumbani alipofika katika chumba chake na kufika chumba chake.
ref: Damon alienda moja kwa moja chumbani kwake na akalala.

src: David and Mia decided to leave the movie.
mt: David na Mia wakatarajia kuondoka filamu.
ref: David na Mia waliamua kutoka kutazama filamu.

src: Bob's daughter thanked Grandma for the delicious meal.
mt: Bob's mtoto alimshukuru baba yake kwa chakula cha kipindukipo.
ref: Binti ya Bob alimshukuru Bibi kwa chakula hicho kitamu.

src: Suzi hoped the cat would stay in the tree.
mt: Suzi alamani kwa kushikilia kiti.
ref: Suzi alitumai paka angekaa kwenye mti.

src: Ava flushed all the aquarium water down the toilet.
mt: Ava alifuta maji yote ya akwari kwa kuchukua kwenye kifaa cha kuchukua maji.
ref: Ava alifoka maji yote ya tangisamaki ndani ya choo.

src: It costs more for gas to the other theater.
mt: Ina gharama zaidi kwa mafuta kwa nyingine kwa jumba la ndege.
ref: Gesi inagharimu zaidi kwenda kwa jumba hilo lingine la maonyesho.

src: I decided to get rid of the car.
mt: Nilichagua kufichua gari.
ref: Nikaamua kuuza gari hilo.

src: She won the contest and was proud of herself.
mt: Aliwahi kushinda mashindano na alikuwa na furaha nayo.
ref: Alishinda mashindano na akajivunia sana.

src: Then she lay down and took a nap.
mt: Baadaye alipiga kichwa na kula nenda.
ref: Kisha akajilaza chini na kulala kidogo.

src: The puppy's owner gave Matt a reward for finding it.
mt: Malipo kutoka mwenye kuuza kwa Matt kwa kupata kuuza.
ref: Mmiliki wa mtoto huyo wa mbwa akampa Matt tuzo kwa kumpata.

src: Mike didn't like riding bikes.
mt: Mike hakuogopa kupanda pikipiki.
ref: Mike hakupenda kuendesha baiskeli.

src: Lucy realized the meal was burned.
mt: Lucy alijua chakula kimepulika.
ref: Lucy alitambua chakula kimeungua.

src: Tim's teacher praised his attentiveness.
mt: Mwalimu wa Tim alimwambia kuheshimu uangalifu wake.
ref: Mwalimu wa Tim alisifu usikivu wake.

src: Amy became best friends with the operator.
mt: Amy alikuwa rafiki wa kizazi na mwenye kazi.
ref: Amy akawa rafiki wa karibu na mwendeshaji.

src: He was disappointed in his broken computer.
mt: Alisikitika kwa kompyuta yake iliyopata tamaa.
ref: Alikuwa ametamaushwa na kompyuta yake iliyoharibika.

src: They never found the owner and kept the dog.
mt: Wao hawakutana na mwenyeji na kuendelea kula mbuzi.
ref: Hawakuwahi kumpata mmiliki na wakaishi na mbwa.

src: Bill was happy to practice every day.
mt: Bill alikuwa na furaha kutumia kila siku.
ref: Bill alifurahi kufanya mazoezi kila siku.

src: Afterwards Carlos puts a bandage on his knee.
mt: Baadaye Carlos anapata kitambulisho cha kichwa chake.
ref: Baadaye Carlos anafunga bandeji kwenye goti lake.

src: Lance's wife felt very romantic and loving when she arrived home.
mt: Mke wa Lance alikuwa na uhusika na upendo wakati alipokwenda nyumbani.
ref: Mke wa Lance alihisi mapenzi na upendo sana alipofika nyumbani.

src: Keith ordered a burger and fries.
mt: Keith aliamua kuuza nyama na chipsi.
ref: Keith aliagiza hambaga na chipsi.

src: Leah forgot how to speak Spanish.
mt: Leah alikasirika kwa kutokuelewa lugha ya Kihispania.
ref: Leah alisahau jinsi ya kuzungumza Kihispania.

src: After two hours firefighters came and rescued Jay.
mt: Baada ya masaa mawili wafanyikazi wa moto wakapata na kuondoa Jay.
ref: Baada ya saa mbili, wazima moto walikuja na wakamwokoa Jay.

src: He was accused of pedophilia and sent to prison.
mt: Alitupwa na kesi ya kujinajisi na kupelekwa mahakamani.
ref: Alishtakiwa kwa kunajisi watoto na akapelekwa gerezani.

src: Ted's friends thought he would run in the campaign uncontested.
mt: Wapendwa wa Ted walikataa kwamba Ted atakapendelea kushiriki katika kampeni bila kushindana.
ref: Marafiki wa Ted walidhani angegombea kwenye kampeni bila kushindana.

src: She continued playing with the ball all afternoon.
mt: Aliendelea kucheza na mpira kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Aliendelea kucheza na mpira alasiri nzima.

src: We cursed Mama for what she'd done.
mt: Kweli, tulimwua Mama kwa yale aliyofanya.
ref: Tulimlaani Mama kwa kile alichokuwa amefanya.

src: Bob had always been reckless.
mt: Bob alikuwa mwenye kushindwa kwa kila aina.
ref: Bob alikuwa mtu wa kutojali kila wakati.

src: Carl decided to give the bike to his son.
mt: Carl alikuwa ameshaamua kupa biki yake kwa mtoto wake.
ref: Carl akaamua kumpa mtoto wake baiskeli hiyo.

src: She went back and had another large serving of deer meat.
mt: Alienda tena na kula nyingine kubwa ya nyama ya nyumbu.
ref: Alirudi na akakuka kipande kingine kikubwa cha nyama ya kulungu.

src: He ended up becoming a scientist.
mt: Alipokwenda kuwa mwanasayansi.
ref: Mwishowe akawa mwanasayansi.

src: Julie was incredibly embarrassed.
mt: Julie alikuwa na hofu kubwa.
ref: Julie aliabika sana.

src: James finished in the top 50.
mt: James alishika nafasi ya kati ya 50.
ref: James alimaliza kwenye 50 bora.

src: I knew then that I wanted to become a professional cyclist.
mt: Nilijua hapo hapo nilikuwa nataka kuwa mtu wa kazi kama mpira.
ref: Nilijua wakati huo kwamba nilitaka kuwa mtaalam wa kuendesha baiskeli.

src: The teacher told them to stop talking.
mt: Mwalimu alimwambia wale wote wanaoongea.
ref: Mwalimu aliwaambia waache kuzungumza.

src: Daniel went to check the breaker box.
mt: Daniel alipata kufika kwenye kifaa cha kuzimua.
ref: Daniel akaenda kuangalia kisanduku cha kikate.

src: I hoped he would just give me a warning.
mt: Nilimwamini atakayeleta neno moja.
ref: Nilitumai anipe onyo tu.

src: Melissa's mother suggested putting her son to bed earlier.
mt: Mama ya Melissa alisema kuwakaribisha mtoto wake kwa maji zaidi.
ref: Mama ya Melissa alipendekeza kumlaza mtoto wake mapema.

src: Mark did not do well and felt defeated.
mt: Mark alikosa na kushindwa.
ref: Marko hakufanya vizuri na akahisi ameshindwa.

src: Rex enjoys himself.
mt: Rex anapendelea.
ref: Rex anafurahia.

src: He took the organ home and learned to play it beautifully.
mt: Alifika nyumbani na kujifunza kucheza vyema.
ref: Alipeleka kinanda hicho nyumbani na akajifunza kukicheza vizuri.

src: They bought some fish.
mt: Waliwapa majani.
ref: Walinunua samaki kadhaa.

src: They filled their cups with ice.
mt: Walifika majiko yao na barafu.
ref: Wakajaza vikombe vyao na barafu.

src: She loved her new turtle.
mt: Alimwita wewe mpenzi wangu.
ref: Alimpenda kobe wake mpya.

src: The children decided to play hide and go seek instead.
mt: Watu wachanga waliamua kucheza kama vile kujificha na kuingia kwa picha.
ref: Badala yale watoto waliamua kucheza kujificha na kutafutana.

src: Francisco became an accountant.
mt: Francisco alikuwa mwanahisabati.
ref: Francisco akawa mhasibu.

src: She hung the pinecones from the trees and waited for the birds.
mt: Alihifadhi mabega ya mawe ya pini kwenye miti na akawaomba wanyama.
ref: Alining'iniza sonobari kwenye miti na akasubiri ndege.

src: This would be our new favorite restaurant.
mt: Hii ndio restoranti yetu mpya.
ref: Hii itakuwa mkahawa wetu mpya tunayopenda.

src: She was full and happy.
mt: Alikuwa na nguvu na furaha.
ref: Alikuwa ameshiba na mwenye furaha.

src: They had no children.
mt: Walikuwa bila watoto.
ref: Hawakupata watoto.

src: Gina's teacher told her she could use her phone.
mt: Gina's mwalimu alimwambia anaweza kutumia simu yake.
ref: Mwalimu wa Gina alimwambia anaweza kutumia simu yake.

src: Jill was glad she went to the doctor.
mt: Jill alikuwa na furaha kwamba alifika daktari.
ref: Jill alifurahi alienda kwa daktari.

src: Then she realized it was Saturday.
mt: Baadaye alijua kuwa siku ilikuwa siku ya Jumamosi.
ref: Ndipo akagundua ilikuwa siku ya Jumamosi.

src: Sara cried out in pain.
mt: Sara alimkataa kwa majungu.
ref: Sara alilia kwa ajili ya maumivu.

src: Pat thinks about all the time he wasted commuting.
mt: Pat anasikitika kwa wakati wote alivyowakamata kutembea.
ref: Pat anafikiria kuhusu wakati wote alipoteza kusafiri.

src: Todd's knees shook as he skated because he was nervous.
mt: Kipenzi cha Todd alikuwa na mafuriko kwa miguu wakati wa kushika kwa sababu alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Magoti ya Todd yalitetemeka akiteleza barafuni kwa sababu alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: Joan was disappointed in her roomate.
mt: Joan alikuwa na hasira kwa mkeke wake.
ref: Joan alitamaushwa na mkazi mwenza wake.

src: He showered after he finished working out.
mt: Ali kulaani baada ya kufanya mazoezi.
ref: Alioga baada ya kumaliza kufanya mazoezi.

src: She took off her jacket to cool off.
mt: Aliacha kofia yake ili kuziba.
ref: Alivua jaketi yake apigwe na upepo.

src: Nina bought a new bike with her earnings.
mt: Nina alipata kipande cha kazi, alipata gari la kisasa.
ref: Nina alinunua baiskeli mpya na mapato yake.

src: Tami wished Gina would shut up, but she just kept talking.
mt: Tami alitamani Gina ajiweke, lakini Gina alikuwa anatolewa.
ref: Tami alitamani Gina anyamaze, lakini aliendelea kuongea.

src: Harry quickly fixed the problem for his mother.
mt: Harry kwa haraka alifanya kazi yake kwa mama yake.
ref: Harry alitatua tatizo kwa haraka kwa ajili ya mama yake.

src: I like helping others.
mt: Nilinipenda kushirikiana na wengine.
ref: Napenda kuwasaidia wengine.

src: Kevin was very angry with Stacy.
mt: Kevin alikuwa na furaha kubwa na Stacy.
ref: Kevin alimkasirikia sana Stacy.

src: However, turns out to just be gas.
mt: Lakini, kama ilivyotambulika, ni mafuta tu.
ref: Walakini, kumbe ikatokea kuwa ni gesi.

src: If it wasn't such easy work she would have quit.
mt: Kama hawakupewa kazi hizi kwa kila mara anajifanya kama kama alikuwa anafanya kazi hizi.
ref: Ikiwa haingekuwa kazi rahisi, angekuwa ameacha.

src: My dad always drove safely and we arrived quickly.
mt: Baba yangu alikuwa anavyoendesha vizuri na hatimaye tukapata kwa kasi.
ref: Kila wakati baba yangu aliendesha gari salama na tulifika haraka.

src: Gill and Peter Falk shared a mutual hatred for each other.
mt: Gill na Peter Falk walikuwa na uhasimu wao wote.
ref: Gill na Peter Falk walishirikiana chuki kati yao.

src: He did not miss the last one, but was still disappointed.
mt: Alisahau la mwisho, lakini alikuwa na hasira.
ref: Hakukosa ya mwisho, lakini bado alikuwa amesikitishwa.

src: His cheating wife continued the affair.
mt: Mke wake aliyemwaga muda mwingine alitumia muda huo kwa kufanya nafasi nyingine.
ref: Mke wake mdanganyifu aliendeleza mapenzi hayo ya nje ya ndoa.

src: Ivan was happy the hike ended so well.
mt: Ivan alikuwa na furaha kwa hivyo hiki kwa hiki kuhitaji.
ref: Ivan alifurahi matembezi yalimalizika vizuri.

src: Paige decided to play in the snow,
mt: Paige aliamua kucheza katika barafu,
ref: Paige aliamua kucheza kwenye theluji,

src: John was upset that they had such an awful time.
mt: John alikuwa na hasira kwamba walikuwa na muda mwingi mno wa maumivu.
ref: John alikasirika kwamba walikuwa na wakati mbaya sana.

src: The man did not like music.
mt: Kiumbe hakuwa na uwezo wa kuona muziki.
ref: Mtu huyo hakupenda muziki.

src: Maggie was glad that the wait in line was so short.
mt: Maggie alikuwa na furaha kwamba wakati wa kuwakiliana ulikuwa rahisi.
ref: Maggie alifurahi kuwa alisubiri katika foleni kwa muda fupi sana.
